input:

Options:
(A) zero
(B) one
(C) two
(D) three
(E) four
(F) five
(G) six
(H) seven
(I) eight
(J) nine
(K) ten
(L) eleven
(M) twelve
(N) thirteen
(O) fourteen
(P) fifteen
(Q) sixteen
output:
Sure, here is the answer to the question:

If all the notebooks are removed from the floor, there will be three grey cat toys remaining on the floor. So the answer is (C).
